verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \f + \fr 3:1 \ft Hebrew nachash, translated in this chapter as serpent, is translated in most cases as snake.\f* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w crafty|strong="H6175"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woman, “\w Did|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* really say, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*?’”

\w The|strong="H6086"\w* woman answered \w the|strong="H6086"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*, “We \w may|strong="H5175"\w* eat \w the|strong="H6086"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H6086"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H6086"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H6086"\w* said, ‘\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.’”

“\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*,” \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* told \w her|strong="H4191"\w*.

“\w For|strong="H3588"\w* God \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* eat \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* God, \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* woman \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w pleasing|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w desirable|strong="H2530"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* obtaining \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* ate \w it|strong="H5414"\w*. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* some \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* husband \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* ate \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w sewed|strong="H8609"\w* \w together|strong="H8609"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5929"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w coverings|strong="H2290"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*. God Arraigns Adam and Eve

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* breeze \f + \fr 3:8 \ft Or at the breezy (time); Hebrew unto the Ruach\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2244"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* out \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man, “Where \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w*?”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Your|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*; \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w myself|strong="H2244"\w*.”

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4480"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*?” asked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*. “\w Have|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* eaten \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w to|strong="H6680"\w* eat?”

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man answered, “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* woman whom \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6086"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* ate \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* woman, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” “\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* \w deceived|strong="H5377"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*,” \w she|strong="H2063"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* ate.” The Fate of the Serpent

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*: “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, cursed \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* livestock \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*! \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w belly|strong="H1512"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* eat, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* I \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w put|strong="H7896"\w* enmity between \w you|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* woman, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* between \w your|strong="H7896"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w her|strong="H7896"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* crush \w your|strong="H7896"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* strike \w his|strong="H7896"\w* \w heel|strong="H6119"\w*.\f + \fr 3:15 \ft Or He will bruise your head, and you will bruise his heel. The same Hebrew root for crush, bruise, or strike appears twice in this verse.\f*” The Punishment of Mankind

\w To|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* said: “\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* sharply \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w your|strong="H7235"\w* \w pain|strong="H6093"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w childbirth|strong="H3205"\w*; \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w pain|strong="H6093"\w* \w you|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Your|strong="H7235"\w* \w desire|strong="H8669"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H7235"\w* husband,\f + \fr 3:16 \ft Or You will desire to control your husband\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w you|strong="H3205"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* Adam \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*: “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* eaten \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* eat, cursed \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w toil|strong="H6093"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

Both \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w thistles|strong="H1863"\w* it \w will|strong="H7704"\w* yield \w for|strong="H7704"\w* you, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* you \w will|strong="H7704"\w* eat \w the|strong="H7704"\w* \w plants|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H7704"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w By|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sweat|strong="H2188"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* brow \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ground|strong="H6083"\w*— \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H6083"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* Adam \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H2416"\w* \w Eve|strong="H2332"\w*,\f + \fr 3:20 \ft Eve sounds like the Hebrew for giving life or living.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*. The Expulsion from Paradise

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w garments|strong="H3801"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* Adam \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Us|strong="H3045"\w*, \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w reach|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* eat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*...”

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* banished \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ground \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5647"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*.

So \w He|strong="H2416"\w* \w drove|strong="H1644"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w man|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w stationed|strong="H7931"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w Garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, along \w with|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* whirling \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* flame \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.
